Package the_game

Class Hero

java.lang.Object
the_game.Entity
the_game.LivingEntity
the_game.Hero
public class Hero extends LivingEntity
The class representing the living entity Hero and all informations associated with it.
Author:
Camille Girodengo

      Parameters:

    • openChest

      public void openChest(char direction, Chest[] chests)
      Finds the chest right next to the hero in the direction given and opens it once found
      Parameters:
      direction -

      the character representing the direction in which the function must find the chest.
      The inputs associated to each cardinal direction is : 'z' -> Up, 's' -> Down, 'q' -> Left, 'd' -> Right.

      chests - an array of chests in which the function must find the chest to open
      See Also:
      • openChest(Chest)

    • throwWeapon

      public void throwWeapon(int nbElement)
      Throws the weapon which is contained at a specific index in the Weapon array of the inventory
      Parameters:
      nbElement - the index of the weapon to throw
      Throws:
      does - not throw the weapon if it is currently equipped

    • throwArtifact

      public void throwArtifact(int nbElement)
      Throws the artifact which is contained at a specific index in the Artifact array of the inventory
      Parameters:
      nbElement - the index of the artifact to throw
      Throws:
      does - not throw the artifact if it is currently equipped

    • throwPotion

    • isEnemyAround

      public boolean isEnemyAround(Enemy[] enemies, Boss[] bosses)
      Checks if there is a hostile living entity in the direct vicinity of the hero
      Parameters:
      enemies - a array of common enemies
      bosses - a array of boss enemies
      Returns:
      Whether or not an enemy is right next to the hero

    • whoIsAround

      public String[] whoIsAround(Enemy[] enemies, Boss[] bosses)
      Search the names of the enemies around the hero
      Parameters:
      enemies - a array of common enemies
      bosses - a array of boss enemies
      Returns:

      A String array of size 4. A case for each direction which contains the name of the enemy next to the hero in this direction or null if there is no enemy. Association of index for each direction : 0 -> Up, 1 -> Right, 2 -> Down, 3 -> Left

    • equipWeapon

      public void equipWeapon(Weapon newWeapon)
      Replaces the currently equipped weapon by another one and updates the hero's stats depending on the stats bonuses the previous and current weapon have.
      Parameters:
      newWeapon - the new weapon to equip
